title: Marcus Morris Sr. - Wikipedia
snippet: (born September 2, 1989) is an American professional basketball player who last played for the Cleveland Cavaliers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He played college basketball for the Kansas Jayhawks before being selected 14th overall by the Houston Rockets in the 2011 NBA draft.

title: Who is Marcus Morris Sr.? | RevUpSports.com
snippet: He plays as a power forward/small forward for the Los Angeles Clippers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Morris began his NBA career in 2011 after being selected 14th overall by the Houston Rockets. He has since played for several teams, including the Phoenix Suns, Detroit Pistons, and New York Knicks...

title: Marcus Morris, New York Knicks, PF - News, Stats, Bio - CBS Sports
snippet: Morris signed with the Knicks earlier this offseason but was let go before playing a single game.
